episodes.title: Episode 39: My Scientology Movie (with Louis Theroux and LFF Director Clare Stewart)
episodes.description: We're thrilled to welcome documentarian Louis Theroux on to our podcast this week, to talk about his new film 'My Scientology Movie', plus London Film Festival director Clare Stewart tells us all about this year's festival. Two interviews, plus a comprehensive review of 'My Scientology Movie', this is a real bumper episode of the Curzon Film Podcast. Discussing the film are Sam Howlett, Helen Seymour and Jake CunninghamProduced and edited by Jake CunninghamStudio services by CSRFM.comMusic supplied by incompetech.com Hosted on Acast.
